title: Enhancing Medical Practical Skills: Digital Media-Based Aesthetic Appreciation Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can enhance aesthetic emotions by over 20% through digital poetry appreciation content with various color designs.

After comparative analysis of three medical/nursing visual materials (color vs. black-and-white: patient charts, medical equipment designs), learners write 500-character reflections on how design differences affect emotional communication
Learners identify three or more poetic images using text-image interaction analysis techniques in multimedia environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
